mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REST_INFO(r_licnum, u_id, r_lname, r_addr, r_dtad, r_bname, r_tel, f_code, r_intro, r_minprice, r_img) VALUES (#{r_licnum}, #{u_id}, #{r_lname}, #{r_addr}, #{r_dtad}, #{r_bname}, #{r_tel}, #{f_code}, #{r_intro}, #{r_minprice}, #{r_img})
INSERT INTO REST_OPEN (r_id, w_code, r_opent, r_closet) VALUES (#{r_id}, #{w_code}, #{r_opent}, #{r_closet})
mapper.select:
select A.r_id, r_lname, r_intro, r_minprice,r_img, TRUNC(AVG(r_score),1) AS AVG, COUNT(D.o_num) AS SUM1, COUNT(E.o_num) AS SUM2, r_addr from rest_info A left join rest_cat B on A.r_id = B.r_id left join cat_code C on B.c_code = C.c_code left join order_info D on B.r_id = D.r_id left join review_info E on D.o_num = E.o_num where B.c_code = #{c_code}
group by A.r_id, r_lname, r_intro, r_minprice,r_img,r_addr order by SUM1
select c_code, c_cname from cat_code order by c_code
select r_id, r_lname, r_bname, r_tel, r_intro, r_minprice, r_img from rest_info where r_id = #{r_id}
select r_id, w_code, r_opent, r_closet from rest_open where r_id = #{r_id} and w_code = #{w_code}
select r_id, A.w_code, to_char(r_opent, 'HH24:MI') as r_opent, to_char(r_closet, 'HH24:MI') as r_closet, w_cname from rest_open A join week_code B on A.w_code = B.w_code where r_id = #{r_id}
select r_id, c_code from rest_cat where r_id = #{r_id}
select A.p_code, r_id, p_cname from pay_method A join pay_code B on A.p_code = B.p_code where r_id = #{r_id} group by A.p_code, r_id, p_cname order by A.p_code
